The 2nd Helsinki-HKUST-Tsinghua Workshop

on Mobile Big Data and Networking

HomeProgramCommitteeVenue

Tsinghua University, Beijing, 17th - 19th September 2015.

The 2nd Helsinki-HKUST-Tsinghua workshop on mobile big data and networking is a three-day workshop jointly organized by the University of Helsinki, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, and Tsinghua University.

The workshop is intended to bring together professors, researchers and students to share ideas, experience and implementations related to mobile big data and networking, including big data analytics, mobile computing, urban computing, SDN, mobile offloading and 5G networks.

Airport Transportation to Hotel

  1. By the Beijing Airport Express. Public Subway Transportation map is attached. The nearest subway station from Tsinghua is 五道口(Wu Dao Kou) on Line 13. The fastest route is
    1. Take the AE (the only subway at the airport), and get off at 三元桥(San Yuan Qiao)
    2. Take Line 10 to 知春路(Zhi Chun Lu)
    3. Take Line 13 to 五道口(Wu Dao Kou)
    4. 文津酒店(Wenjin Hotel) will be within about 15 minutes walk.
  2. By taxi. A taxi ride from the airport to Tsinghua goes all the way west.

Meeting location:

Room 5-206, Rohm Building, Tsinghua University.

Campus map is attached. The route is marked on the map above.

Hotels:

文津酒店 (Wenjin Hotel). Haidian, Zhongguancun East Road, 1st Yard 1st Building(海淀，中关村，1号院5号楼). It may be clearer if you show the google map to the taxi driver.
